section.heading: District of Columbia public school funding.
section.text: The District of Columbia Public Schools should fully fund pre-kindergarten, full-day kindergarten, school counselors, and librarians.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of subchapter see notes to § 38-2801.
For temporary (90-day) addition of Chapter 1B 1981 Ed., see notes following § 38-2801.
